segments.text: I can't open this email attachment our Paris office has sent me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you sure you're using the right program ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , yes it's definitely the same program but I might have the wrong version . Their system is newer than ours .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's why you can't open it . You'll have to upgrade before you can read the file .
segments.speaker: S2
